author: TalCual
title: Ceballos asegura disminuciÃ³n de 16% en el Ã­ndice de criminalidad
text: Ministro Ceballos asegura disminuciÃ³n de 16% en el Ã­ndice de criminalidad en 2023 Remigio Ceballos Ichaso, ministro de Relaciones Interiores informÃ³ sobre una disminuciÃ³n de 16,8% en el Ã­ndice de criminalidad en comparaciÃ³n con aÃ±os anteriores, y calificÃ³ el descenso como Â«un duro golpe a las mafias criminalesÂ». Por su parte, el director del Observatorio Venezolano de Violencia (OVV), Roberto BriceÃ±o LeÃ³n, destacÃ³ que pese a la disminuciÃ³n registrada este aÃ±o, la tasa nacional es superior a la de paÃ­ses tradicionalmente violentos, como MÃ©xico, Colombia y Brasil El ministro de Relaciones Interiores, Remigio Ceballos Ichaso, asegurÃ³ que durante el 2023 el Ã­ndice de criminalidad tuvo una disminuciÃ³n de 16,8% en comparaciÃ³n con aÃ±os anteriores, y calificÃ³ como Â«un duro golpe a las mafias criminalesÂ» que les ha permitido Â«obtener grandes victoriasÂ». En la presentaciÃ³n de un balance, el tambiÃ©n vicepresidente sectorial para la Seguridad Ciudadana y la Paz, destacÃ³ que en operativos contra el narcotrÃ¡fico, fueron incautados â€œmÃ¡s de 52 toneladasâ€ durante 2023, lo que representa un 26,91% en relaciÃ³n al 2022. Asimismo, el ministro informÃ³ cerca del despliegue de 3 mil cuadrantes de paz en 804 parroquias de los 329 municipios del territorio nacional, que beneficiarÃ¡ al 83,65% de la poblaciÃ³n. *Lea tambiÃ©n: [Ceballos afirmÃ³ que directores de penales intervenidos estÃ¡n siendo investigados](https://talcualdigital.com/ceballos-afirmo-que-directores-de-penales-intervenidos-estan-siendo-investigados/) Al respecto, Ceballos destacÃ³ la labor de los Ã³rganos de seguridad en el desarrollo de la OperaciÃ³n de LiberaciÃ³n Gran Cacique Guaicaipuro, contra las mafias carcelarias, que â€œpermitiÃ³ liberar a Venezuela de las mafias carcelarias (â€¦) eso se acabÃ³, y ha sido gracias a la acciÃ³n radical del equipo de Gobierno que lidera nuestro Presidente NicolÃ¡s Maduro Morosâ€, seÃ±alÃ³. Dotaciones El ministro Ceballos tambiÃ©n informÃ³ sobre la entrega y dotaciÃ³n de 2 mil 903 vehÃ­culos, camionetas especiales y motocicletas para el fortalecimiento de la Gran MisiÃ³n Cuadrante de Paz. Asimismo, anunciÃ³ la activaciÃ³n del Grupo Motorizado de Emergencias (Grumae) para la atenciÃ³n y administraciÃ³n de desastres. Asimismo, Ceballos junto al jefe de Gobierno de Distrito Capital, Naum FernÃ¡ndez, reinauguraron la sede principal del Cuerpo de Bomberos de Caracas. DestacÃ³ que, Â«durante todo el aÃ±oÂ» el departamento recibiÃ³ dotaciÃ³n en general, equipamiento constante y permanente a todos nuestros bomberosâ€. 6.973 muertes violentas en 2023 Durante el 2023 se registraron al menos 6.973 muertes violentas, segÃºn datos presentados por el [ Observatorio Venezolano de Violencia (OVV) ](https://talcualdigital.com/ovv-registro-159-menos-en-tasa-de-asesinatos-en-comparacion-a-2022/)en su informe 2023. La cifra supone una reducciÃ³n en comparaciÃ³n con los aÃ±os 2021 y 2022. El director del Observatorio Venezolano de Violencia (OVV), Roberto BriceÃ±o LeÃ³n, dijo que se calcularon 581 fallecimientos violentos por mes, 134 por semana y 19 por dÃ­a. El informe arroja que hubo 1.956 homicidios y 953 muertes por intervenciÃ³n policial. *Lea tambiÃ©n: [OVV registrÃ³ 15,9% menos en tasa de asesinatos en comparaciÃ³n a 2022](https://talcualdigital.com/ovv-registro-159-menos-en-tasa-de-asesinatos-en-comparacion-a-2022/) â€œSe nota que a lo largo del aÃ±o (2023) se ha dado una estabilizaciÃ³n en las muertes violentas. En aÃ±os anteriores habÃ­a meses que tenÃ­an una mayor presencia de violencia, este aÃ±o vemos que hay una cierta homogeneizaciÃ³n a lo largo de 12 meses, lo cual lo interpretamos como una estabilizaciÃ³n de los eventos en una fase de violencia crÃ³nica que se ha ido instalando en el paÃ­sâ€, expresÃ³ BriceÃ±o. AgregÃ³ que las cifras de desaparecidos en Venezuela siguen siendo altas. El observatorio contabilizÃ³ 1.443 personas desaparecidas a lo largo del aÃ±o. â€œAunque observamos una reducciÃ³n importante en las cifras de las tasas de muertes violentas en el paÃ­s, la tasa que tenemos a nivel nacional es superior a la de paÃ­ses tradicionalmente violentos, como MÃ©xico, Colombia y Brasil. La tasa de Venezuela es solo superada por Ecuador y Honduras, que serÃ­an los paÃ­ses que encabezarÃ­an las cifras en la regiÃ³nâ€, alertÃ³ BriceÃ±o.

author: Godfrey Benjamin
title: Binanceâ€™s CZ Warns of macOS and iPhone Exploit Affecting Crypto Community
text:
Binanceâ€™s former CEO cautions Mac users on a major security vulnerability. Apple has a history of security flaws that can lead to crypto losses, calling for safeguards. Changpeng Zhao (CZ), the former CEO of Binance Exchange, recently informed the crypto community of a new vulnerability targeted at Intel-based Mac users. The vulnerability affecting iPhones and iPads may expose usersâ€™ digital assets.
Zhao Sounds An Alarm Taking to the X platform, Zhao urged Mac users with Intel-based chips to update their devices, following a zero-day exploit on November 19. â€œIf you use a Macbook with an Intel-based chip, update asap. Stay SAFU,â€ CZ wrote .
If you use a Macbook with Intel based chip, update asap!
Stay SAFU! https://t.co/mk2Jsicnte
â€” CZ ðŸ”¶ BNB (@cz_binance) November 20, 2024
Zero-day vulnerabilities are flaws identified and exploited by hackers before a patch becomes available. The term â€œzero-dayâ€ refers to developers having limited time to fix the vulnerability upon discovery.
These vulnerabilities pose a high risk because the longer they remain undetected, the longer attackers have to exploit them. It can result in severe consequences for end users, such as data breaches, financial loss, privacy violations, and disruption.
Apple confirmed the attack in a postmortem and introduced major macOS and iOS security updates to prevent further damage. The company urged users to update to iOS 18.1.1, macOS Sequoia 15.1.1, and the older iOS 17.7.2. Apple described one of the addressed vulnerabilities as a cookie management issue.
The tech giant identified the vulnerabilities as CVE-2024-44308 and CVE-2024-44309, which affected macOS Sequoiaâ€™s JavaScriptCore and WebKit components. Hackers can use this to execute â€œcross-site scripting attacksâ€ and covertly launch malicious code.
Cross-site scripting (XSS) is a web security attack that involves injecting malicious scripts into legitimate websites or applications. Crypto hackers have previously used similar vulnerabilities on Mac and Windows computers to steal wallet passwords and insert malware to steal private keys and digital assets.
Researchers at Googleâ€™s Threat Analysis Group, notorious for probing government-backed hacks, initially uncovered the latest vulnerabilities. As a result, speculation has grown over the possible involvement of state-sponsored actors. Meanwhile, Apple has yet to share any details regarding the extent of the damage other than the fact that the vulnerabilities were â€œactively exploited.â€
Concerns For Apple and MacOS Users Apple users have been at risk on several occasions this year alone despite the Companyâ€™s stellar reputation for security. CNF reported earlier this month that North Korean hackers exploited macOS with malware hidden in decoy PDFs to steal crypto keys.
In March, researchers discovered a flaw in Appleâ€™s M-series chips that hackers could leverage to retrieve cryptographic keys stored in the CPUâ€™s cache. A month later, Web3 wallet provider Trust Wallet warned about another zero-day exploit in Appleâ€™s iMessage framework. This attack allowed hackers to infiltrate iPhones without any user interaction.
Amid these attacks, Apple launched the iPhone 16, its first smartphone with native Artificial Intelligence (AI) support. As CNF noted , the news stirred excitement among holders of AI crypto tokens.

author: GB Times
title: Why isnÊ¼t elemental on Disney+ plus?
text:
Why Isnâ€™t Elemental on Disney+?
Disney+ is the latest streaming service to hit the market, and it has been making waves with its extensive library of Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic content. However, one notable absence from the platform is the popular animated series Elemental . In this article, we will delve into the reasons behind Elementalâ€™s absence from Disney+ and explore the possibilities of when it might arrive.
What is Elemental?
For those who may be unfamiliar, Elemental is a Disney-Pixar animated series that premiered on Disney Junior in 2021. The show is set in a world where the elements of nature, such as fire, water, and earth, are alive and personified. The story follows three elemental siblings, Ember, Wade, and Onyx, as they navigate the challenges of growing up and learning to control their elemental powers.
Why isnâ€™t Elemental on Disney+?
Disney+ has been criticized for its limited selection of Disney Junior content, and Elementalâ€™s absence is a major disappointment for fans of the show. So, why isnâ€™t Elemental on Disney+? Here are some possible reasons:
Licensing agreements : Disney may not have the necessary licensing agreements in place to stream Elemental on Disney+. The show is produced by Disney Junior, but itâ€™s possible that the licensing rights have been sold to another platform or network.
Target audience : Elemental is primarily targeted towards young children, and Disney+ may not be the best platform for this age group. Disney Junior is designed specifically for young children, and its content is more geared towards preschoolers.
Content restrictions : Disney+ has strict content guidelines, and some shows may not meet the platformâ€™s standards. Elemental may contain elements (pun intended) that are not suitable for all audiences, such as mild violence or mature themes.
Unavailability of episodes : Elemental has only two seasons with a total of 26 episodes. Itâ€™s possible that Disney+ is waiting for the show to complete its run or produce more episodes before adding it to their library.
When will Elemental be on Disney+?
While we canâ€™t predict the future, we can make some educated guesses. Disney+ has a track record of adding Disney Junior shows to their platform , such as Sofia the First and Doc McStuffins . Given this trend, itâ€™s possible that Elemental will eventually make its way to Disney+.
Future of Disney Junior content on Disney+ : Disney has announced plans to increase the amount of Disney Junior content on Disney+, including new shows and exclusive content. This could mean that Elemental will be part of this expansion.
Elementalâ€™s popularity : Elemental has a dedicated fan base, and its popularity could prompt Disney to reconsider its absence from Disney+. If the show performs well on other platforms, it may increase the likelihood of it being added to Disney+.
Conclusion
Elementalâ€™s absence from Disney+ is a mystery that has left fans of the show disappointed and curious. While we canâ€™t confirm the exact reasons behind its absence, we can speculate that licensing agreements, target audience, content restrictions, and unavailability of episodes may be contributing factors. However, Disney+ has a history of adding Disney Junior shows to their platform, and Elementalâ€™s popularity could increase the likelihood of it being added in the future. Until then, fans of the show will have to continue watching on other platforms.

author: Matthew Wilson
title: Passenger, Who Felt Pressured To Give Up His Seat On Flight, Reveals How Quick Thinking Got Them Out Of Seat Swapping
text:
No one likes to swap seats on a flight. Often, you're paying a premium for certain seats anyway. Plus, you would catch me walking before I catch that dreaded middle seat. It turns out one passenger agreed with me. A passenger shared a time that one traveler tried to pressure them to give up their seat.
But they quickly turned the table. On Reddit, the passenger decided to share their story. They wrote, "Just sharing one of my favorite seat swapping stories. I was in an aisle seat and the woman in the aisle seat across from me decides she wants to help out this family. She turns to me and says the guy next to her (in the middle seat) would very much like to sit next to his family (wife and daughter seated in the middle and window seat next to me). She asks, would you be willing to help them out by swapping seats?"
In response, the passenger smiled and said, "Sure! So you'll take the husband's middle seat and then I'll take your seat." However, the woman appeared confused by the request.
Passenger Turns The Tables
She said, "They just want to sit together."
The passenger responded, "Sure! Happy to switch with you. So you'll take his seat and I'll take yours." According to the Reddit post, that's when the woman learned to mind her own business.
The Redditor wrote, "The confusion sets in. Brow furrows. And, then...the glorious moment when that lightbulb goes off. Shaking her head violently and frowning, says: 'Oh no, I don't want to give up my seat?' I relax in my seat with my smug smile and thinking my job here is done. By saying yes to her, I forced her to be the one to say no."
It's best to just not be that person. In fact, writer and advisor, Nicole Campoy Jackson told People that you shouldn't ask your fellow passengers to swap seats with you. Instead, it's better to alert a flight attendant if you have issues and let them solve it.
"I am always in the camp of getting a flight attendant involved for sticky in-flight situations," she said. "Tensions run high when we're traveling plus they would know, for example, if there was another aisle seat or another solution to this problem. They have more context than we, the passengers, do."

author: Staff
title: Univision Arizona Lanza la Beca â€œTu Futuroâ€ en la NAU
text:
Text to speech audio articles made possible by the Quest Grant at Yavapai College. Tuition free industry recognized certificates for your career.
|
Motivando a los estudiantes de secundaria en Arizona a seguir una carrera universitaria, Univision Arizona, un destacado canal de televisiÃ³n en espaÃ±ol, se asociÃ³ con la Universidad del Norte de Arizona (NAU) para crear e implementar el programa de becas â€œTu Futuroâ€. Este programa de becas forma parte de la iniciativa de empoderamiento comunitario Contigo de Univision Arizona. Ofrece una beca a un estudiante de Arizona para cubrir el costo total de matrÃ­cula y alojamiento durante cuatro aÃ±os de estudios de pregrado en NAU.
NAU es una de las 10 principales universidades en el paÃ­s en la producciÃ³n de tÃ­tulos de licenciatura para estudiantes hispanos. Reconocida como una InstituciÃ³n que Sirve a Hispanos (HSI, por sus siglas en inglÃ©s), NAU estÃ¡ reforzando su compromiso con el logro educativo, aumentando los fondos para becas y recursos adicionales para su diversa comunidad estudiantil. La Oficina de Becas y Ayuda Financiera de NAU igualarÃ¡ la contribuciÃ³n de Univision Arizona cada aÃ±o, proporcionando una beca correspondiente a un estudiante de pregrado, duplicando asÃ­ el impacto.
â€œUnivision Arizona se siente honrada de asociarse con Northern Arizona para otorgar esta beca completa, basada en un ensayo, de cuatro aÃ±os. La educaciÃ³n es la clave para el futuro de nuestra comunidad, y Univision Arizona estÃ¡ comprometida a tomar medidas concretas para ofrecer oportunidades educativasâ€, dijo Mark Masepohl, presidente y gerente general regional de Univision Arizona.
La asociaciÃ³n y el apoyo de Univision Arizona elevan a NAU como una HSI, reforzando los sistemas de apoyo para los valiosos estudiantes de la universidad.
â€œLa FundaciÃ³n NAU estÃ¡ profundamente agradecida con Univision Arizona por invertir en nuestros estudiantes y fortalecer la designaciÃ³n de NAU como una InstituciÃ³n que Sirve a Hispanosâ€, dijo Nick Lobjeko, vicepresidente de Avance de NAU y director ejecutivo de la FundaciÃ³n NAU. â€œSu compromiso con el Ã©xito estudiantil crea acceso y oportunidades para que los estudiantes persistan en su bÃºsqueda de un tÃ­tulo universitarioâ€.
Los estudiantes que ingresen como primer aÃ±o para el ciclo escolar de otoÃ±o de 2025 podrÃ¡n postularse para la beca entre el 2 de diciembre de 2024 y el 15 de abril de 2025, presentando un ensayo de 250 palabras describiendo el impacto profundo que su tÃ­tulo universitario tendrÃ¡ tanto en su trayectoria personal como en la comunidad hispana en general. Para mÃ¡s informaciÃ³n, visite nau.edu/Univision-scholarship.

author: PTI
title: Liquor sale banned in Ayodhya's Panchkosi Parikrama Marg area | Entertainment
text: Liquor sale banned in Ayodhya's Panchkosi Parikrama Marg area Ahead of the consecration ceremony at the Ram temple in Ayodhya, the sale of liquor has been banned on the Panchkosi Parikrama Marg of the temple town, Uttar Pradesh Minister Nitin Agarwal said.The pran pratishtha, or the consecration ceremony of the Ram Lalla idol, will take part on January 22 and Prime Minister Narendra Modi will take part in it.Ayodhya is a major pilgrimage place where people from the entire country and the world arrive to have a glimpse of Ram Lalla. [PTI](/pti-stories)| Lucknow | Updated: 29-12-2023 15:44 IST | Created: 29-12-2023 15:20 IST - Country: - India Ahead of the consecration ceremony at the Ram temple in Ayodhya, the sale of liquor has been banned on the Panchkosi Parikrama Marg of the temple town, Uttar Pradesh Minister Nitin Agarwal said. The ''pran pratishtha'', or the consecration ceremony of the Ram Lalla idol, will take part on January 22 and Prime Minister Narendra Modi will take part in it. ''Ayodhya is a major pilgrimage place where people from the entire country and the world arrive to have a glimpse of Ram Lalla. Under the guidance of Chief Minister (Yogi Adityanath), it was decided to ban the sale of liquor on Ayodhya's Panchkosi Parikrama Marg,'' said Agarwal, the minister of state (independent charge) for Excise and Prohibition. ''A prohibition has been declared there. All wine shops there have been removed and nobody will (be allowed to) open liquor shops there,'' he said on Thursday. According to Mahant Raju Das of the Hanumangarhi temple, Panchkosi Parikrama takes place on the 'ekadashi' after Diwali. Devotees undertaking the parikrama cover a distance of around 50 kilometres. (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.)
